attributes.action: Stop wasting thousands of taxpayer's money supporting the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We don't dislike the Eurovision Song Contest, however we are entirely fed up of wasting hundreds of thousands of pounds supporting this EU event where we consistently received nil points due to the political agendas of every European Country. We must, however, give praise to Ireland for their points this year and rejoice in the peaceful future of the entire Irish nation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
